chapter.title: Create and update your program
chapter.p: To create a new program, click on the “New Program” button on the Programs page. (This is the default page for Mingle Plus users. To access your Mingle Projects, click on the Projects navigation pill in the orange Mingle header.)

A new program will be created and contain a backlog, plan (with a default one-year timeline, one month before and eleven months after today) and a projects space. All of these elements will be empty to provide you a “blank slate” to start developing your program.
To edit your program name, click on the admin carrot and select “Rename.” Simply edit inline and press return to save.
To modify your program dates, click on the admin gear on your program's plan timeline view.
